entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
